title: Warmth for Dhaka's Homeless
description: Providing winter clothes to underprivileged families in Dhaka city.

title: Chattogram Winter Relief
description: Distributing blankets and warm clothes to the needy in Chattogram.

title: Sylhet Cold Protection Drive
description: Helping tea garden workers and low-income families in Sylhet stay warm.

title: Rajshahi Blanket Distribution
description: Supporting rural communities in Rajshahi with essential winter supplies.

title: Barishal Winter Aid
description: Helping fishermen and underprivileged families in Barishal combat winter.

title: Mymensingh Warm Clothes Drive
description: Providing warm clothes and blankets to children in Mymensingh.

title: Khulna Winter Essentials Distribution
description: Distributing essential winter items to impoverished families in Khulna.

title: Rangpur Cold Weather Relief
description: Helping farmers and day laborers in Rangpur stay warm this winter.

title: Winter Support for Bandarban Hills
description: Providing warm clothes to indigenous communities in the Bandarban hills.

title: Patuakhali Coastal Winter Assistance
description: Distributing blankets to coastal communities affected by winter chills.
